src:
El abogado de Anna Chiara del Boca hará una presentación para que Granata no asuma

06 Nov 2019, 17:17


Juan Pablo Fioribello, abogado de Anna Chiara Del Bocca, dijo que su representada presentará una denuncia penal contra su padre por abuso sexual y afirmó que la psicóloga del caso comprobó que la joven fue abusada. Además realizará una presentación para que Amalia Granata no asuma como diputada.

Juan Pablo Fioribello, abogado de la hija de Andrea Del Bocca, Anna Chiara Del Bocca, expresó que Anna Chiara va a presentar una denuncia penal contra el padre de la joven de 18 años Ricardo Biasotti.
Fioribello también aseveró que la psicóloga que evaluó a Anna Chiara confirmó que había sido abusada. “En el expediente había dibujos de Anna Chiara donde aparece su padre desnudo”, detalló el abogado.
Respecto a que Amalia Granata estaría involucrada en el caso porque fue pareja del padre de Anna Chiara cuando sucedieron los hechos, Fioribello señaló que “se hará una presentación para que Granata no pueda asumir como diputada”.

Notas Relacionadas
text:
Anna Chiara del Boca's lawyer will make a presentation so that Granata does not assume

06 Nov 2019, 17:17


Juan Pablo Fioribello, lawyer of Anna Chiara Del Bocca, said that her representative will file a criminal complaint against her father for sexual abuse and said that the case's psychologist proved that the girl was abused. He will also make a presentation so that Amalia Granata does not assume as a deputy.

Juan Pablo Fioribello, lawyer for Andrea Del Bocca's daughter, Anna Chiara Del Bocca, said Anna Chiara is going to file a criminal complaint against the father of 18-year-old Ricardo Biasotti.
Fioribello also said that the psychologist who evaluated Anna Chiara confirmed that she had been abused. "In the file there were drawings of Anna Chiara where her father appears naked," said the lawyer.
Regarding that Amalia Granata would be involved in the case because she was the couple of Anna Chiara's father when the events happened, Fioribello said that “a presentation will be made so that Granata cannot assume as a deputy”.
